about_the_game:
When you invited Ashley to go for a walk with you at Paradise Trails, you had no idea how the beauty of nature would bring out her wild and naughty side. On your very first date, she decides to shed her clothes and spend the afternoon prancing naked around the trail with you. And that is just the beginning. The more time you and Ashley spend walking through nature, the more turned on she becomes.

As her trust in you grows, she opens up to you about her naughty fantasies, and asks you to be the one to help her make them all come true. And before you know it, Ashley is inviting her Best Friend Britney to come along and join in the naughty, naked fun.

Paradise Trails is an Engaging, Erotic First-Person Experience, where you participate in a number of stimulating sexual experiences with Ashley and her best friend Britney. The game is Sexy and Fun, and can be enjoyed with or without VR equipment.

This exciting sexual experience features:
  • Numerous stimulating erotic experiences where you view and control the action from the first-person perspective
  • Full English voice-over, including content by the amazingly talented and insanely-Sexy Mia Sloane as Ashley.
  • A casual, relaxing erotic story that unfolds with you as the main attraction in Ashley's very naughty fantasies.

content_descriptors.notes: Paradise Trails contains nudity, graphic sexual content and mature language and themes throughout. It is intended for mature audiences only. All characters in the game are above the age of eighteen years old.

detailed_description:
Please Be Aware

Paradise Trails is an immersive erotic story-based experienced. There is not a significant amount of "Game Play" or fast paced activity. If you are interested in immersing yourself in an erotic story where you play the leading role in a couple of girls' naughty fantasies, then this game is for you. If you are are looking for "quick thrills", this may not be the game for you.

name: Paradise Trails

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4500 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11 GPU w/ 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Paradise Trails is an Erotic Story-Based VR Experience where you help the beautiful and spirited Ashley live out her wildest sexual fantasies among the beauty of nature at Paradise Trails.
